meanings.definition: The organ in the chest that pumps blood through the body.
meanings.sent1: My heart beats fast when I run.
meanings.sent2: The doctor listened to my heart with a stethoscope.
meanings.sent3: I left my heart rate monitor at home, so I had to guess how fast my heart was racing.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like music to his heart.
meanings.sent5: The heart is like a pump that never stops working.

meanings.definition: The center or core of something.
meanings.sent1: The heart of the matter is understanding each other.
meanings.sent2: The heart of the city is where all the action happens.
meanings.sent3: She found the heart of the maze and finally escaped.
meanings.sent4: The heart of the problem lies in communication breakdown.
meanings.sent5: In the heart of the forest, you can find peace and tranquility.

meanings.definition: The seat of a person's thoughts and emotions.
meanings.sent1: He spoke from the heart and touched everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: Her art comes straight from the heart.
meanings.sent3: Singing karaoke always brings out my inner diva from the heart.
meanings.sent4: His words cut her to the heart, leaving her speechless.
meanings.sent5: The heart knows what the mind can't explain.
